edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.manager

Class CourseManagerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.manager.CourseManagerTest

  • public class CourseManagerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests the CourseManager class. Because CourseManager is a Singleton, the clearData() method must be called to ensure that each test starts with an empty CourseManager and that each test runs independently.
    Author:
    SarahHeckman

        public void testSaveCourses()
        Tests CourseManager.saveCourses(). Test is similar to CourseRecordsIOTest, but writes the courses stored in the CourseManager's list.

      • testSaveStudents

        public void testSaveStudents()
        Tests CourseManager.saveStudent(). Test is similar to StudentRecordsIOTest, but writes the students stored in the CourseManager's list.
